sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import getSymbolFromCurrency from 'currency-symbol-map' class HotelDetails extends Component { render() { let {hotel} = this.props; return

{hotel.name}

{hotel.city + ',' + hotel.country}
Rating {hotel.review_word}
{hotel.review_score}
{getSymbolFromCurrency(hotel.currency_code)}{hotel.price} /week
} } export default HotelDetails;
